==== Correct resolution/refresh ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.04 (Hardy Heron): Live-CD starts in 800x600 mode.

==== Suspends ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.04 (Hardy Heron): In Live-CD doesn't wake up after suspending.
